**Night Vision Devices (NVDs) Call for Industry Information and Feedback**
===========================================================

**Purpose:**
-----------

Trade Agreement: NONE
Tendering Process: Competitive - Open bidding
Strategic Approach: *N/A - P&A/LOI Only*

**Background:**
------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking industry information and feedback in support of the Department of National Defence (DND) project: Night Vision System Modernization (NVSM). The three core capabilities required are: Night Vision Devices (NVD), Hand Held Thermal Imagers (HHTI) and Laser Aiming Devices (LAD).

**RFI Description:**
--------------------

Respondents are requested to provide information on the capabilities and prices of:

1. Monocular and Binocular Night Vision Devices (MNVD & BNVD)
2. Hand Held Thermal Imagers (HHTI)
3. Laser Aiming Devices (LAD)

PSPC aims to collaborate with industry on procurement, Industrial and Technological Benefits (ITB), and technical requirements. Respondents are asked to:

1. Provide information on off-the-shelf technology, indicative costing, and warranty information.
2. Participate in the development of performance specifications and budgeting.
3. Comment on the existing requirements and suggest improvements.

**Submission Guidelines:**
-------------------------

Respondents may submit their responses in either official language of Canada. Documents may be submitted in PDF format.

Release of Request for Information (RFI) Regarding Night Vision Devices
================================================================= 

 Canada has invited interested suppliers to gather information and provide feedback on the requirements of Department of National Defence (DND) for Night Vision Devices (NVD).

The Night Vision Devices (NVD) of the Night Vision System Modernization (NVSM) project requirement is specific to Monocular and Binocular Night Vision Devices (MNVD & BNVD). 

 Industry suppliers are invited to provide information regarding:

- Technical Specifications and features
- Cost estimation
- Warranty information
- Sustainment and after-sales services
- Any other relevant information they deem useful
